fields.definition: A short title of the clinical study written in language intended for the lay public. The title should include, where possible, information on the participants, condition being evaluated, and intervention(s) studied.

The recruitment status for the clinical study as a whole, based upon the status of the individual sites. If at least one facility in a multi-site clinical study has an Individual Site Status of 'Recruiting,' then the Overall Recruitment Status for the study must be 'Recruiting.'
The name of the entity or the individual who is the sponsor of the clinical study.

Other organizations (if any) providing support. Support may include funding, design, implementation, data analysis or reporting. The responsible party is responsible for confirming all collaborators before listing them. Limit: 160 characters.
